alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Burke, southern Richmond, Barnwell and southwestern Aiken Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near USC Aiken to near Jackson to 8 miles northeast of Wrens. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, Plant Vogtle, Hephzibah, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Jackson, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, McBean, Gloverville, Barnwell State Park, Graniteville, Blythe, Hilda, Keysville, and Snelling. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
